transcript: dio members hello and a very good morning to all of you...
summary: The 19th annual general meeting of Penelitian Protect Limited was conducted through video conferencing due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The company reported a net revenue of ₹44.61 crores in 2019-20 and a net profit of ₹1.74 crores. The chairman, Mr. Kim Lambert, thanked customers, employees, and shareholders for their support and guidance. The meeting approved the audited financial statements and appointed a new director, Mr. Kim Lambert.
key_points: Appointment of new director, Mr. Kim Lambert
Impact of COVID-19 pandemic on the company
action_items: Assign new director, Mr. Kim Lambert
Follow up on company's financial performance
Implement measures to overcome the impact of COVID-19 pandemic
participants: Mr. Manx, Assistant Manager, Legal Compliance
follow_up: Follow up on company's financial performance
Implement measures to overcome the impact of COVID-19 pandemic
next_steps: The company will implement measures to overcome the impact of COVID-19 pandemic and follow up on its financial performance.
